thread.title: Putnam Announces Dividend Rates for Open-End Funds

author: cnbc.com
title: Putnam Announces Dividend Rates for Open-End Funds
text:
BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Trustees of The Putnam Funds have declared the following distributions today.

DATE
